vote.title: Authorize a forty-year contract, with two five-year renewal options, for development of a cultural arts facility, operation, and management of the facility in the concept of an arts incubator for the Office of Arts and Culture - Sammons Center for the Arts, most advantageous proposer of two - Estimated Annual Revenue:  General Fund:  $1
